== Description ==
Looks up the blog URL based on the domain as a search term.

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$domain|string|The domain of the blog to look for.}}
{{Parameter|$path|string|The path of the blog to look for.}}

== Return Values ==
; <tt>(string)</tt> : Returns the blog url.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_blogaddress_by_domain($domain, $path); ?>%%%
